question: I had a dream about my grandad, who passed away.My female cousins n I were sitting around his grave
answer:
QUESTION
my uncle went in and picked up the leg of the deceased.At first it was fleshy and normal, then suddenly it turned to decay.the dream was scarry.what does it mean.im 16 years old.
ANSWER


Share:
The dream is clear. Death is a reality. Everyone has to go through death. When one goes into the grave, the body decays and disintegrates.

The only thing remains is our Imaan and good deeds.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
